Axton Betz-Hamilton, PhD, AFC®️ is an Associate Professor of Consumer Affairs in the Ness School of Management and Economics at South Dakota State University.
We are thrilled to welcome Axton Betz-Hamilton to the Ness School as part of the Consumer Affairs major. Her passion for finance is inspiring.
